channel.title: Make Gather Darkness a Night Ability
channel.description: Reaper sometimes wastes 2 souls by getting jailed after using Gather Darkness so it seems like it should be a night ability. Or is there some programming issue that prevents one from using both night abilities in the same night?

item.title: Make Gather Darkness a Night Ability
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
This would be quite a buff to reaper, because reaper can now also both gather darkness and chill during the day. I like the extra decision making involved in using gather darkness to be honest.

Read full topic
item.source: Make Gather Darkness a Night Ability

item.title: Make Gather Darkness a Night Ability
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
We could just make it a night Ability that does exactly what a gather darkness + reap would do.

Read full topic
